page.title: 17LOCAL HISTORY SOCIETY
page.content: Since its formation in 1974,Tackley Local History Group has sought to accumulate a data-base which forms the basis for detailed study of the parish. This has included indexing and extracting information from the{16th {century manorial court roll, the {parish registers}and other archives, and the copying and reduction to common scales of estate and parish maps. {Field work}has included pottery collection,{hedgerow dating,}and assistance with an excavation to establish the pre-conquest (1066) existence of the{Parish Church.} The result of a detailed investigation into{pauper emigration}from the parish was awarded second prize in a major competition.
